head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PETERSEN, TIMOTHY EDWARD,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PETERSEN, TIMOTHY EDWARD,

block.p: PETERSEN - Timothy Edward, age 51 of St. Charles, IL, formerly of Brooklyn, NY and Wilton, CT. Husband of Lee A. Son of Margaret O'Connor Petersen and Thomas G. Petersen. Dear brother of Thomas G. (Kathy) Petersen Jr., Robert L. (Arlene) Petersen. Sonin-law of Constance S. Applegate and the late Dr. William V. Applegate. Uncle of Thomas G. (Jennifer) Petersen III, Ryan T. and Katie M. Petersen. Great uncle to Grace E. Petersen. Memorial Mass 11:00 AM Thursday, June 29 at Saint Cassian's Church, Upper Montclair, NJ. Burial at Vail Cemetery, NJ. In lieu of flowers to the Charity of Donors choice. For information, Yurs Funeral Home, St. Charles, IL 60174, (630) 584-0060.

In lieu of flowers to the Charity of Donors choice. For information, Yurs Funeral Home, St. Charles, IL 60174, (630) 584-0060.
